title: The Favorites - Stanley Cup Playoffs Betting Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - Stanley Cup Playoffs Betting Preview
description:
The battle for Lord Stanley's Cup begins this week as the NHL's best compete for the most prestigious trophy in North American sports. Join Action Network's Chad Millman and Simon Hunter to discuss how to approach it from a betting perspective is Action hockey editor Michael Leboff, one of the most passionate NHL bettors anywhere. He takes hockey novice Chad through the intricacies of betting on playoff hockey, before the group delves into the best hockey movies of all-time. Can the Boston Bruins win it all? Will a Canadian team break the Stanley Cup drought? Will Leboff pass away if the Maple Leafs make the Finals? All this and so much more. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
